name: Blueberry French Toast
ingredients: 12 slices day old white bread, crust removed
instructions: Cut bread into 1‚Äù cubes; place half in a greased 9 x 13 pan.
Cut cream cheese into 1 in. cubes; place over bread.
Top with blueberries and remaining bread cubes.
In a large bowl beat eggs.
Add milk and syrup; mix well.
Cover and chill for 8 hours or overnight.
Remove from refrigerator 30 minutes before baking.
Uncover; bake 25-30 minutes longer or until center is set.
For a syrup: combine sugar, cornstarch and water until smooth.
Bring to a boil over medium heat; cook and stir for 3 minutes.
Simmer for 8-10 minutes or until berries have burst.
Stir in 1 Tbsp butter until melted.
